page.title: 03Bus Services in Chapel
page.content: Chapel St. Leonards has 31 buses a day in the summer and 8 buses a day in the winter.From Skegness you can go to Chapel Green for 80p,85p for Chapel Point,in Chapel there is no return fare for either of them.All service buses go to Skegness bus station on Richmond Drive.In the summer the buses run from Monday to Saturday,sometimes the buses don't run on a Saturday at 07.11,07.51 and 16.31.On Sundays they run from 07.36 till 18.24.In the week days they run from 06.51 till 22.59.In the winter they run every hour and they run from 06.50 till 18.05 returned to Chapel from 08.09 till 19.20.the bus 590 goes to Chapel only while the bus 591 goes on to Mablethorpe.
